resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105368</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105368</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Citizen ACTion Curricula: High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrpläne Des Bürger-ACTion: High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmes d'études du Citoyen ACTion : 
Lycée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curricula Do Cidadão ACTion: High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi di studi Del Cittadino ACTion: 
High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προγράμματα σπουδών πολιτών ACTion: Γυμνάσιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planes de estudios Del Ciudadano ACTion: 
High School Secundaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Ten lesson plans from Do Something Inc. to explaining why and how people get involved in effecting change in their communities and how students can get involved.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">10 Lektionpläne von tun etwas Inc. zum Erklären 
warum und wie Leute beteiligt erhalten, wenn sie Änderung in ihren 
Gemeinschaften bewirken und wie Kursteilnehmer beteiligt erhalten 
können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dix plans de leçon de font quelque chose inc. à 
expliquer pourquoi et comment les gens deviennent impliqués en 
effectuant le changement de leurs communautés et comment les 
étudiants peuvent devenir impliqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dez plantas da lição de fazem algo Inc. a 
explicar porque e como os povos começam involvidos em efetuar a 
mudança em suas comunidades e como os estudantes podem começar 
involvidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dieci programmi di lezione da fanno qualcosa inc a
spiegare perchè e come la gente ottiene implicata nell'effettuare il 
cambiamento nelle loro Comunità e come gli allievi possono ottenere 
implicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δέκα σχέδια μαθήματος από κάνουν κάτι Α.Ε. στην 
εξήγηση γιατί και πώς οι άνθρωποι αναμιγνύονται στην 
πραγματοποίηση της αλλαγής στις κοινότητές τους και πώς οι 
σπουδαστές μπορούν να αναμιχθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diez planes de la lección de hacen algo inc. a 
explicar porqué y cómo la gente consigue implicada en efectuar el 
cambio en sus comunidades y cómo los estudiantes pueden conseguir 
implicados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105368</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/citizen-action-curricula-high-school</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
